question: 軍艦島
sourceMnemonic: A <ja>軍艦</ja> is a <kanji>battleship</kanji>, and <ja>島</ja> is an island. Welcome to... <vocabulary>Battleship Island</vocabulary> (go Jurassic Park music).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This word uses the on'yomi readings for <ja>軍</ja> and <ja>艦</ja>, and the kun'yomi reading for <ja>島</ja>. You learned all of them, so you should know the reading already! Oh, but watch out for the rendaku.
